text: The spare house keys are in the blue ceramic bowl by the front door.
author: Caregiver

text: Grandson Timmy plays soccer every Saturday at 10 AM. He wears jersey number 7.
author: Caregiver

text: Dinner is usually served to you by your maid Melissa at 7PM
author: Mark

text: You are Type 2 Diabetic. You have been assigned medications according to the prescription given by Doctor Paul
author: Maanas
